details.title: Range sidelobes blanking by comparing outputs of contrasting mismatched filters

authors.affiliation: Department of Electrical Engineering ¿ Systems, Tel-Aviv University, Chaim Levanon Street, Tel Aviv 69978, Israel
authors.name: N. Levanon

authors.affiliation: Department of Electrical Engineering ¿ Systems, Tel-Aviv University, Chaim Levanon Street, Tel Aviv 69978, Israel
authors.name: A. Scharf

details.abstract: Range sidelobes, a major shortcoming of radar pulse compression, are often reduced through the use of mismatched filters. The authors propose to blank the remaining sidelobes by using two or more mismatched filters, whose sidelobes are designed to peak at different delays. The authors show how to design such filters and present promising simulation results with two or more mismatched filters.

ieee.title: Overlaying orthogonal coding for sidelobe suppression in HFSW radar
ieee.displayText: Li Chao, Zhang Ning, "Overlaying orthogonal coding for sidelobe suppression in HFSW radar", Signal Processing (ICSP) 2010 IEEE 10th International Conference on, pp. 1890-1893, 2010.

ieee.title: Double V-chirp waveform scheme for false targets suppression in nonlinear processing of delay-Doppler maps
ieee.displayText: Jiahua Zhu, Chongyi Fan, Sudan Han, Xiaotao Huang, "Double V-chirp waveform scheme for false targets suppression in nonlinear processing of delay-Doppler maps", Progress in Electromagnetic Research Symposium (PIERS), pp. 1894-1899, 2016.

ieee.title: Inter-pulse frequency and code diversity for range correlation sidelobe suppression
ieee.displayText: Zhineng Mao, Yinsheng Wei, "Inter-pulse frequency and code diversity for range correlation sidelobe suppression", Radar Conference (RadarConf) 2016 IEEE, pp. 1-5, 2016, ISSN 2375-5318.

ieee.title: Biologically Inspired Processing of Radar Waveforms for Enhanced Delay-Doppler Resolution
ieee.displayText: Shahzada B. Rasool, Mark R. Bell, "Biologically Inspired Processing of Radar Waveforms for Enhanced Delay-Doppler Resolution", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 59, pp. 2698-2709, 2011, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: Multiband Waveform Design for an Ultrasonic Indoor Positioning System
ieee.displayText: Alejandro Lindo, Enrique García, Jesús Ureña, María del Carmen Pérez, Álvaro Hernández, "Multiband Waveform Design for an Ultrasonic Indoor Positioning System", Sensors Journal IEEE, vol. 15, pp. 7190-7199, 2015, ISSN 1530-437X.

ieee.title: Mismatched filters for Doppler-sensitive active sonar pulses
ieee.displayText: Raphaël F. Pallaud, Philip R. Atkins, "Mismatched filters for Doppler-sensitive active sonar pulses", Signal and Image Processing Applications (ICSIPA) 2011 IEEE International Conference on, pp. 150-155, 2011.

patentCitations.patentAbstract: A method for transmission and detection in an adaptive-on-transmit (AT) system operating in the electromagnetic spectrum comprising determining a waveform-filter pair; and employing the waveform-filter pair in transmission and detection, wherein two or more are provided of the group consisting of an auto-correlation function sidelobe level reduction proportional to a the filter length, K, or better, an out-of-band spectral suppression of at least about 40 dB, and a frequency spectrum power tail power decay of K-4 or better.
patentCitations.title: Extended optimal filters for adaptive radar systems using binary codes
